nodes.description: 2015年12月21日，Bagram发生自杀式袭击，一名载有爆炸物的自杀式袭击者冲撞北约-阿富汗联合巡逻队，造成6名北约士兵死亡（含2名美国人）、2名美国人及1名阿富汗人受伤
nodes.support_text: On December 21, 2015 in Bagram, a suicide bomber blew himself up, killing six NATO service members.

nodes.description: 同日，塔利班发言人Zabiullah Mujahid通过Twitter和电子邮件宣称对袭击负责
nodes.support_text: Zabiullah Mujahid, the spokesperson for the Taliban, claimed they were responsible for the attack via Twitter and e-mail.

nodes.description: 同日，美国国防部及白宫发表声明，谴责袭击并慰问受害者家属，承诺继续支持阿富汗反恐与重建
nodes.support_text: U.S. Secretary of Defense Ash Carter responded to the bombing... White House Office of the Press Secretary issued a statement...

nodes.description: 2015年12月21日，Bagram发生自杀式袭击，一名载有爆炸物的自杀式袭击者骑乘摩托车冲撞北约-阿富汗联合巡逻队
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：自杀式炸弹袭击者骑乘摩托车

edges.support_text: Zabiullah Mujahid, the spokesperson for the Taliban, claimed they were responsible for the attack via Twitter and e-mail.
U.S. Secretary of Defense Ash Carter responded to the bombing, stating...
语义描述中明确提到骑乘摩托车的动作发生在袭击发生时
